document_data.name: ''Door of beasts''
document_data.mainbody:
A '''''door of beasts''''' was a [[dweomered door]] that, when disturbed, would burst open and spew forth monsters and beasts per the [[spell]] ''[[summon monster IV]]''.

These doors were always made with elaborate knobs and knockers in the shape of the head of a beast with [[gem]]s for eyes. Before they were activated they were found shut and locked until someone tampered with them.
document_data.Creation: ''Door of beasts'' were created with use of the ''summon monster IV'' spell.
